title: The Armor of God Week 2 with Kelly Needham
description:
Join us for the second and final week of The Armor of God reading plan. This week, Amanda and Raechel discuss the sandals of the gospel of peace, the shield of faith, the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit with author and Bible teacher, Kelly Needham. Along the way, the three remind one another of the way each piece of armor is rooted in the reality of the gospel. Listen in this week as Raechel, Amanda, and Kelly share the ways in which they have put on and experienced the armor of God in their own lives. 


Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 2 of the She Reads Truth The Armor of God reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 

Shop The Armor of God collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/the-armor-of-god-week-2-with-kelly-needham
